q: Stuff your eyes with wonder... live as if you'd drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories.
h:
“Stuff your eyes with wonder... live as if you'd drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories.” —
Ray Bradbury

q: If you want to turn a vision into reality, you have to give 100% and never stop believing in your dream.
h:
“If you want to turn a vision into reality, you have to give 100% and never stop believing in your dream.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

q: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
h:
“Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.” —
Henry David Thoreau

q: I believe that potential is unlimited - success depends on daring to act on dreams.
h:
“I believe that potential is unlimited - success depends on daring to act on dreams. ” —
Estee Lauder

q: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
h:
“Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.” —
John Wooden

q: Don't concern yourself with the money. Be of service. Build. Work. Dream. Create.
h:
“Don't concern yourself with the money. Be of service. Build. Work. Dream. Create.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: First comes the shy wish. Then you must have the heart to have the dream. Then, you work, and work.
h:
“First comes the shy wish. Then you must have the heart to have the dream. Then, you work, and work. ” —
Estee Lauder

q: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
h:
“Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: Life is but one dream flowing into another.
h:
“Life is but one dream flowing into another.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
h:
“Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.” —
Buddha

q: The greatest doer must also be a great dreamer.
h:
“The greatest doer must also be a great dreamer.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

q: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
h:
“The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams. ” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: Many have died; you also will die. The drum of death is being beaten. The world has fallen in love with a dream. Only sayings of the wise will remain.
h:
“Many have died; you also will die. The drum of death is being beaten. The world has fallen in love with a dream. Only sayings of the wise will remain.” —
Kabir

q: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
h:
“Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.” —
Napoleon Hill

q: Trust in dreams, for in them is the hidden gate to eternity.
h:
“Trust in dreams, for in them is the hidden gate to eternity. ” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.
h:
“Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.” —
Estee Lauder

q: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
h:
“A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.” —
Yoko Ono

q: Some of the greater things in life are unseen; that's why you close your eyes when you kiss, cry, or dream.
h:
“Some of the greater things in life are unseen; that's why you close your eyes when you kiss, cry, or dream.” —
Unknown

q: You can't tell big dreams to small minded people.
h:
“You can't tell big dreams to small minded people.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Anyone who dreams of an uncommon life eventually discovers there is no choice but to seek an uncommon approach to living it.
h:
“Anyone who dreams of an uncommon life eventually discovers there is no choice but to seek an uncommon approach to living it.” —
Gary Keller

q: You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.
h:
“You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.” —
John Eliot

q: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
h:
“I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: The dreamers are the saviors of the worlds.
h:
“The dreamers are the saviors of the worlds.” —
James Allen

q: Hope is a waking dream.
h:
“Hope is a waking dream.” —
Aristotle

q: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
h:
“When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.” —
Carol Burnett

q: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
h:
“There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.” —
Paulo Coelho

q: Everything starts with a dream. A particle of our imagination that teases us of what the future could be like, as long as we fight for it.
h:
“Everything starts with a dream. A particle of our imagination that teases us of what the future could be like, as long as we fight for it.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

q: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dream.
h:
“If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dream.” —
Les Brown

q: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
h:
“The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
h:
“All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers. ” —
Orison Swett Marden

q: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
h:
“Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Dream big. Start small. But most of all, start.
h:
“Dream big. Start small. But most of all, start.” —
Simon Sinek

q: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
h:
“You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —
Les Brown

q: Some men see things as they are and ask why. Others dream things that never were and ask why not.
h:
“Some men see things as they are and ask why. Others dream things that never were and ask why not.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: It's necessary to get the losers out of your life if you want to live your dream.
h:
“It's necessary to get the losers out of your life if you want to live your dream.” —
Les Brown

q: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
h:
“Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.” —
James Matthew Barrie

q: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
h:
“A goal is a dream with a deadline.” —
Napoleon Hill

q: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
h:
“Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.” —
Henry David Thoreau

q: Would you rather live your life according to the approval of others or aligned with your truth and your dreams?
h:
“Would you rather live your life according to the approval of others or aligned with your truth and your dreams?” —
Robin Sharma

q: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
h:
“Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: Your dream has to be bigger than your fear.
h:
“Your dream has to be bigger than your fear.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
h:
“Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts or my thoughts the result of my dreams.
h:
“I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts or my thoughts the result of my dreams.” —
D. H. Lawrence

q: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
h:
“I dream my painting and I paint my dream.” —
Vincent van Gogh

q: The dream is free, but the hustle is sold separately.
h:
“The dream is free, but the hustle is sold separately.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Routine life is unbearable, and most people only think about how to escape into the world of fantasy and dreams.
h:
“Routine life is unbearable, and most people only think about how to escape into the world of fantasy and dreams.” —
Robert Greene

q: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
h:
“Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.” —
Les Brown

q: To accomplish big things, I am convinced you must first dream big dreams.
h:
“To accomplish big things, I am convinced you must first dream big dreams.” —
Conrad Hilton

q: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
h:
“Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.” —
Vincent van Gogh

q: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
h:
“Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.” —
Carl Jung
